properties.name: url
properties.label: URL
properties.description: Provide the URL to send the HTTP PUT request. Include Message property values using {propertyname}, {{parametername}} for a flow parameter.

properties.name: request_timeout
properties.label: Request Timeout in Seconds
properties.description: How long to wait for request completion.

properties.name: header_keys
properties.label: Header Keys
properties.description: Specify custom headers. You must provide the corresponding Header Value in the same order. Include Message property values using {propertyname}, {{parametername}} for a flow parameter.

properties.name: header_values
properties.label: Header Values
properties.description: Specify custom headers. Make sure the corresponding Header Key is defined in the same order. Include Message property values using {propertyname}, {{parametername}} for a flow parameter.

properties.name: body
properties.label: Request Body
properties.description: Provide the request body to send. Include variables using {propertyname} for incoming a message's property value, {body} if the incoming message is a Text Message, or to use a flow parameter value, reference it with {{parametername}}.
